comments.comment: Ane hamuduruwane oba wahanse monawada musammil gena danne. Ape peththe swaminwahansela musammilge pathwimata wirodaya dakwimata sadarana hethu godak thiyenawa. Oba wahanseta ada amathaka wela thibunata eda halal prashnayedi musammil thadabala lesa bodu bale wiwechanaya kaleya. A witharak newei 21 pasku praharayedi musammil gaththeda anthawadinge peththai. Aiyo oba wahanse musammilta ahuwela. Oba wahanse kiyana widihata den sampradaika Muslim minissu lankawe ne. A minissuth den anthawadeta thallu wela iwarai. Thawama me Muslim prashna awasan wela nene hamuduruwane. Anika Kurunegala district eke monatharam madrasa pasal thiyenawada. Adatath hema Muslim palliwala ugannanne anthawadaya. Ekata thawama wisandum hoyagena ne. Den thiyena thathwe anuwa kisima mohothaka muslimwaru wiswasa karanna be. Ape Kurunegala gamema monatharam Muslim madrasa pasal thiyenawada. Madyastha Muslim waru ne den. Muslimwaru yahamagata genimatanam aniwarenma owunge education system eka wenas kala yuthui. Ahema nowunoth anagathedi lankawa thawath Bangladeshayak wima welekwiya noheki. Karunakarala obawahanse Kurunegala district ekata gihin me gena hoyala balanna ahe monatharam Muslim anthawadaya pethirilada kiyala. Awita oba wahanseta karunu Honda heti wetahewi
